sources.title: Kit Carson 1940 colorized (Jon Hall)
sources.description: Frontier scout Kit Carson and his band of men escort a wagon train of settlers led by John C. Fremont along the Oregon Trail to California, but they are attacked by Indians given rifles by the government of Mexico, which does not want them getting to California and agitating for it to become an independent state. Jon Hall as Kit Carson Lynn Bari as Dolores Murphy Dana Andrews as Capt. John C. Fremont Harold Huber as Lopez Ward Bond as Ape Renie Riano as Miss Pilchard Clayton Moore as Paul Terry Rowena Cook as Alice Terry Raymond Hatton as Jim Bridger Stanley Andrews as Larkin Colorized by Color Systems Technology
